wikipedia_page.main: Robert Evans (16 July 1927 – 1 September 2001) was a Scottish football player and manager, most notable for his time with Celtic.

response: Robert, Rob, Bob or Bobby Evans may also refer to:
*Bobby Evans (footballer) (1927–2001), Scottish footballer who played for Celtic and Chelsea F.C.
*Bobby Evans (baseball) (born 1969), general manager of the San Francisco Giants
